H0.text: Freckles develop from light, which explains why parents with freckles often have children with freckles.

H1.text: Certain foods cause freckles, which explains why parents with freckles often have children with freckles.

H2.text: Certain habits cause freckles, which explains why parents with freckles often have children with freckles.

H3.text: Freckles are an inherited trait, which explains why parents with freckles often have children with freckles.
